descriptionHtml:
TacitRed Compromised Credentials provides real-time detection and monitoring of compromised user credentials, domain takeovers, and identity-based threats.

This solution includes:

  • Data Connector: CCF (Codeless Connector Framework) connector for TacitRed API integration
  • Analytics Rule: Repeat Compromise Detection to identify persistent threats
  • Workbook: Comprehensive visualization of credential compromise patterns

Key Features:

  • Real-time credential compromise detection
  • Domain-level threat analysis
  • High-risk user identification
  • Confidence scoring and trending
  • Integration with Microsoft Sentinel incidents
